about.body:
### From December 20-23, we are serving a very special menu for one of our favorite Italian-American traditions:

### Feast of the Seven Fishes!

### Find all the info in the [menu](https://cafemarsbk.com/menu/feast%20of%20the%20seven%20fishes/ "menu") and [book](https://www.exploretock.com/cafemarsbk/ "book it!") options!
